name: v1_babynames
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool baby_names_by_api_ninjas.
Tool description: Popular and unique baby name name generator for boys, girls, and gender-neutral names. See more info at https://api-ninjas.com/api/babynames
API description: Fetches a list of baby names from the API Ninjas Baby Names API endpoint.

popular_only.description: Whether to only return popular (top 10%) of names. Must be either 'true' or 'false'. Defaults to 'true' if not set.

gender.description: The gender for the baby names. Must be one of the following: 'boy', 'girl', or 'neutral'.
